name: The Last Defence (Callum Gillespie)
description:
The rest of the world has fallen, but you are still standing. Alone on your miniature planet, how long can you hold off the alien invaders?

Construct turrets and generators to aid you, and upgrade your equipment, but make sure that you have all angles covered on this small planet.

Created as a prototype first-person tower defence game. Experimented with planetary gravity, as well as typical tower defence mechanics and a statistics tracking system.

CONTROLS

WASD : Movement

Space : Jump

Left Click : Shoot

Right Click (when looking at a sector) : Open building menu

Right Click (when looking at a building) : Open upgrade menu

Escape : Pause

Some assets/music used

  • Space ambience track 1
  • Space ambience track 2
  • Skyboxes
  • Gun
